message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice.  While the product seems interesting, $110 is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $95 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go.
